item.title: NELS 49 Paper

item.title: Hello world!
item.description: I have updated my personal website with the help of Hugo. You can browse my work here

item.title: Luis Alonso-Ovalle
item.description:
Associate Professor, Chair Department of Linguistics McGill University 1085 Dr. Penfield Montreal, Canada, H3A 1A7
I work on semantics. I live with Sandra and Diego. I like croissants and bending forks with mind power.

item.title: Publications
item.description: [Handouts, etc] [Papers] [Dissertation] Handouts, etc. Do Scalar Alternatives Provide Enough Truthmakers? (A Note on Santorio, Paolo (2015) Alternatives and Truthmakers in Conditional Semantics), Invited commentary delivered at the 90th Annual Meeting of the American Philosophical Association Pacific Division. San Francisco, CA, March 31 2016. “Neutralizing Free Choice Items via Maximal Domain Restriction: Farsi -i Indefinites” (with Esmail Moghiseh), Semantics and Linguistic Theory 29, University of California at Los Angeles, May 18, 2018.
